```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rio)
library(haven)

all_risk_set <- read.csv("datasets/all_risk_set.csv")
state_data <- read_dta("datasets/state_data.dta") %>% 
  rename(State = "state_name", Year = "year")

risk_state <- all_risk_set %>% 
  full_join(state_data) %>% 
  filter(Year >= 1990)  ## state data starts at 1990
```
